1.title: The Dreamy Schemey
1.plot: Wyatt goes on a mission to prevent Uncle Bob (man that guy is awesome) from moving to California, but when Grimhilt's latest scheme goes awry, Wyatt finds himself trapped in a dream with no way out.

2.title: The Dreamy Schemey Pt. 2
2.plot:

1.title: The Wind of Goodness
1.plot: Wyatt discovers a mysterious new world, unexpected friends, and a super villain named Grimhilt in his tent fort; but when Wyatt loses the Wind of Goodness. Grimhilt plans to build a super weapon of his own and destroy Wyatt's Fort.

2.title: The Monster Dog
2.plot: Wyatt leaves his bike in the park to escape a monster dog and looks for help to get it back, but when Desmond discovers a Doom Box meant for Grimhilt and night approaches, Wyatt must stop Grimhilt and find his bike before it's lost forever.

3.title: WFGT
3.plot: When Wyatt can't come up with a talent for his school talent show, but when Grimhilt enters the talent show and plans to kaboom the school after winning, Wyatt must find a way to beat Grimhilt before Grimhilt uses the Dirge of Destruction.

1.title: Emma
1.plot: Wyatt's little sister, Emma, tricks her way into his fort. To stop her from messing everything up, Wyatt teams up with an unlikely ally, Grimhilt. Grimhilt's plan goes horribly wrong, Wyatt must discover the true value of a little sister.

2.title: Grimlucks
2.plot: Wyatt finds a WisenWatch in the park and it distracts him from what's happening, Desmond addicted to coffee. When Wyatt finds out that the watch belongs to another he doesn't want to give it back, putting Wyatt on a slippery slope.

3.title: A Useless Rescue
3.plot: Useless gets captured by the Snatchman of Powund. Wyatt once again teams up with the super villain, Grimhilt, to infiltrate the Prison of Powund and breakout Useless, but when the rescue goes awry Grimhilt is no where to be found.

imdb.plot outline: Wyatt's Fort, centers around Wyatt, a precocious five-year old, and his two best friends, Howsham and Desmond. This unusual trio experiences all kinds of crazy adventures within the mysterious world residing in Wyatt's Tent Fort. Even though they regularly find themselves in perilous situations, they always see it through to the end with a little help from their friends in the fort and the Book of Illumination.
imdb.title: Wyatt's Fort
plot: _Wyatt's Fort_ (qv), centers around Wyatt, a precocious five-year old, and his two best friends, Howsham and Desmond. This unusual trio experiences all kinds of crazy adventures within the mysterious world residing in Wyatt's Tent Fort. Even though they regularly find themselves in perilous situations, they always see it through to the end with a little help from their friends in the fort and the Book of Illumination.::Chason Laing
